name: Cthulhu Finance
description: What is the project about? Cthulhu. Finance is a comprehensive yield aggregator that automatically sources the highest yield opportunities across various DeFi platforms. What makes your project unique? Cthulhu provides yield farming pools on both ordinary DEX pools as well as lending pools such as Sonne lending pools. History of your project. Cthulhu launched on March 16th and has been tracked by DefiLlama. It is audited by SolidProof and the report has been released already. Yield farming pools of Cthulhu's and Sonne lending pools have been built on the platform. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Cthulhu is seeking for listing on Coingecko, and cooperation with Optimism-based social media and other protocols on Optimism such as Sonne and Velodrome. It will also be a multi-chain project on Arbitrum by 2023 Q2. What can your token be used for? The token of CTH can be used to stake in a single staking pool of Cthulhu and will be used as proof of staking history when the yields are halved and the team began to airdrop time-honored stakers.
